CHAT.comment: Hesitation phenomena have not been accurately transcribed in this data.

u.a: INV explains Warm-up activity to MOT and puts toys on the floor . MOT puts CHI down on the floor
CHI clings to MOT and climbs back up into her arms
<aft> MOT pats CHI on the bottom twice
CHI looks up at the door
CHI stares at door as it closes
<$=1> MOT lifts CHI off her lap and stands him up
MOT looks at the toys on the floor
CHI looks at the toys on the floor
MOT pushes clown's head into jack+in+the+box and closes lid
MOT pushes the jack+in+the+box to CHI
CHI sits down on floor next to MOT
CHI puts his hand on the handle
MOT holds the jack+in+the+box still and looks down at it
MOT starts to turn handle and then MOT retracts her hand
CHI begins to turn handle and then stops
<2> MOT moves football which is on the floor from one spot to another
CHI pauses in his turning of handle
<$=1> MOT holds jack+in+the+box still and watches CHI
CHI leans over and looks at the side of the jack+in+the+box
MOT lets go of jack+in+the+box as she kneels on the floor . MOT watches CHI
<bef> MOT puts CHI's hand back on handle and turns handle with CHI
<bef> CHI pulls his hand away from MOT and tilts jack+in+the+box up with both hands
CHI looks at picture on the top of the jack+in+the+box
CHI continues to look at jack+in+the+box
MOT tries to grab jack+in+the+box toy from CHI
<bef> CHI pulls jack+in+the+box away from MOT
CHI looks panda bear chair next to him
CHI begins to tap the chair back cushion
MOT watches CHI and then looks at the book on the floor
MOT starts to open the book
CHI continues to play with chair cushion
MOT points to picture in book
CHI continues to play with chair cushion
MOT points to picture in book
MOT points to picture on book cover
MOT turns book around to look at cover
CHI tilts jack+in+the+box on its side and looks at picture there
MOT leans over closer to CHI
CHI is turning jack+in+the+box to see pictures on various sides
CHI is turning handle and trying to open lid of the jack+in+the+box which he has between his legs
CHI pulls back quickly from jack+in+the+box
CHI leans back from jack+in+the+box on his hands
MOT touches the clown's head and pulls it back
CHI scoots back further from jack+in+the+box
MOT looks closer at clown's eyes
CHI reaches to touch the clown's face
CHI pushes clown's head into box
MOT picks up duck from the floor
CHI pushes down clown's head with an open hand
the clown comes out of the jack+in+the+box
MOT repeats the action mimicking CHI allowing the clown to pop up
CHI makes a little sound of fright
MOT picks up football and rolls it back to CHI
CHI throws it back to MOT
MOT moves back out of CHI's way
CHI points to jack+in+the+box with the duck in his hand
MOT pushes book over toward CHI
MOT points to picture on page
MOT looks down at the page
<aft> MOT looks at CHI and then back at the book
CHI hands the duck to MOT
MOT hands duck back to CHI
CHI takes the duck from MOT
CHI's back is to the camera
MOT leans back and watches CHI play with duck
CHI turns to look up at MOT
MOT looks at CHI and smiles
CHI turns towards camera with his arm extended holding the duck
MOT turns in the same direction as CHI
CHI points to jack+in+the+box and looks up at MOT
MOT grabs the clown and pulls it back
MOT closes lid again and turns handle once to keep it shut
CHI crawls over to the jack+in+the+box and starts turning it around
MOT turns book around for CHI to see
CHI keeps turning the jack+in+the+box around
MOT looks down at the book
CHI looks the book briefly then at jack+in+the+box in his hands
<bef> CHI picks up the jack+in+the+box and pouts it between his legs
MOT looks down at the book
CHI places jack+in+the+box between his legs and grabs handle
MOT leans back and watches CHI
CHI looks at the jack+in+the+box and extends his arm
MOT turns the handle once briefly
CHI leans over and points to the clown's eyes
MOT touches clown and examines it
CHI moves up closer to jack+in+the+box
camera angle prevents observation of the object of CHI's pointing action
camera angle prevents observation of the object of CHI's pointing action
MOT points to the clown's ear
CHI pushes clown into the box
<bef> CHI leans around to touch clown's hand
CHI leans to other side to touch other hand

INV enters room . INV leaves room while Small Scale Activity takes place and re-enters at 9:12:06 . INV explains Forbidden Object task to MOT and CHI sits on MOTs lap at the table . INV clears away the toys from Small Scale Activity except for the rolling pin which CHI holds
INV takes the forbidden object out of the drawer and sets it on the table in front of CHI
CHI watches INV and then stares at object
INV sets the object in motion
CHI sets the rolling pin on the table
MOT leans close to CHI as she speaks
CHI leans back from the object and blinks his eyes as he watches it
MOT looks down at CHI and then at the object
CHI reaches for the forbidden object
CHI looks at the object and still extends his hand
MOT restrains CHI by pulling him backward
CHI reaches out to touch object
CHI looks at object and lowers his arm
MOT hands CHI the rolling pin off the table
INV explains to MOT the four Parent Child Interaction boxes as CHI still sits at the table on MOT's lap
MOT walks over to desk to get ball out of box
MOT and CHI partially out of camera view
MOT's action not in camera view
MOT's back is the only thing in camera view
<bef> CHI turns to face the camera
MOT gets on hands and knees to get ball
MOT picks up the ball and sits up
<bef> CHI starts to walk back toward desk
MOT holds ball out to CHI
CHI knocks ball out of MOT's hand
CHI watches the ball roll across the floor
CHI walks to waste basket and looks in
MOT turns around to observe CHI at desk
CHI goes out of camera view
<aft> MOT moves one of the chairs at the table
MOT stretches out her hand to CHI
CHI is out of camera view
MOT points to ball on floor
MOT goes out of camera view
<aft> MOT rolls ball into camera view
CHI kicks ball as he is walking
CHI attempts to kick ball but misses
CHI goes to retrieve ball and becomes distracted by object underneath table
MOT walks over to CHI looking underneath table
CHI grabs a block and holds it tightly to his chest
CHI clings block close to his chest and walks across room
MOT walks across room with ball in her hand
MOT goes to desk to put ball away
MOT and CHI out of camera view
CHI puts down block and watches MOT
MOT walks over to CHI with the towel
MOT kneels down and holds towel in front of CHI
CHI takes towel from MOT and places it over the block on the floor
CHI is covering the block with the towel
CHI uncovers block and then stands it upright
CHI drops towel and steps away from block
CHI picks up block and holds close to his chest
MOT covers CHI's head with towel
CHI tries to shake towel off his head
MOT lifts towel off CHI's head
CHI puts the block down on the floor
CHI looks up at MOT as he bends down and tries to pick up the block
MOT lays towel on CHI's head momentarily
CHI grabs the block on the floor and shakes his head then walks across to table
MOT puts towel over her head
CHI continues to walk out of camera view
<3> MOT lifts up towel momentarily to looks at CHI
CHI is partially out of camera view
MOT lifts up towel momentarily and peers at CHI
CHI lifts up towel and looks underneath
MOT lunges forward and embraces CHI
CHI smiles and looks at MOT
towel falls off the heads of both MOT and CHI
MOT holds towel over CHI's head
CHI raises his arms over his head to push towel off
CHI makes sharp twist and walks over to the block on the table
MOT starts to fold the towel
MOT looks at CHI and shakes her head
CHI moves the block on the table
<bef> CHI pushes block aside . CHI reaches out and touches microphone on table top
MOT stands up and goes to put towel back in box on desk
CHI pushes the block on the table
MOT is out of camera view
CHI points to camera . <aft> CHI turns and looks at MOT
MOT is at desk out of camera view
MOT lays box of crayons and paper on the floor and kneels down
CHI walks over to join MOT
CHI sits down on the floor next to box and takes out a crayon
MOT looks up at CHI briefly
CHI picks up sheet of paper from inside box and puts it down abruptly on the floor
<bef> MOT moves box away from CHI
CHI picks up crayons from inside box
CHI puts crayons taken from inside the box and lays them next to him on the floor
CHI pulls a piece of paper from the box for MOT
CHI lays paper beside MOT on the floor
MOT goes to take paper but then lets it rest on the floor
CHI picks another crayon out of the box and puts it on the paper he gave MOT
MOT takes crayon and paper that CHI has put next to her
CHI picks up a crayon off the floor and begins to draw on his paper
CHI turns and reaches for the crayon that MOT has
MOT hands the crayon in her hand to CHI
CHI searches box of crayons and paper
< .4> MOT points to a crayon in the box
CHI pulls it out and looks at it
CHI sets it down on MOT's paper and looks at the other crayon in his hand
CHI looks at crayon he's holding
CHI throws it the crayon in the box and then quickly picks it up again
MOT picks up a crayon from the box
CHI picks up another crayon from his side of the floor
<bef> CHI looks at crayon MOT is showing him
CHI picks up another crayon from MOT's paper
MOT points to the crayon CHI is picking up
CHI plays with crayons in his hand
CHI's back is toward the camera
CHI holds up a crayon to show MOT
CHI leans over and picks up another crayon out of the box
CHI looks through the bunch of crayons in his hand and pulls one out
<bef> CHI throws crayon down and picks up another one

CHI looks up and listens to footsteps outside the room
<bef> MOT turns to look at door
CHI turns his gaze back to bunch of crayons in his hand
<bef> CHI follows MOT's gaze towards desk
CHI switches hands and begins to draw on his hand
<bef> CHI stops drawing and rubs his hand

CHI stops drawing on his hand and commences drawing on the paper
<bef> CHI stops drawing and picks up some of the crayons off of the floor

CHI throws some of the crayons back into the box
MOT takes paper next to her and puts it in box

MOT takes the crayon and draws on her sheet of paper

CHI slides back on the floor

MOT takes the sheet of paper and puts in back in the box
